contentList.content: A legendary artefact of Loviatar that appears more like a torture device than footwear. Its leather gleams with malice, promising unimaginable pain and pleasure.

Forced into a painful and slow walk, you receive a penalty of -[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> -2. You become tolerant to pain and receive <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> +2.

Any pain you experience can be amplified and channeled outwards to those around you. Any time you take damage, enemies within 15m of you will suffer [1] with a wisdom saving throw to reject your pain.
